title: My new client is broken?
body: My client keeps displaying, "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." (seen in link)  But nothing happens, ever. Also the splashart is still the Assassin rework one, is this happening to anyone else? I don't know what to do, plz help {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I see this type of issue typically happen if there's a problem with your League assets and require repair or recreation. I recommend grabbing our Hextech Repair Tool to try to fix this. After booting up the app, check the box for *Force Repatch*, then hit the **START** button. After the process finishes, try launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) from inside your installation directory, which should be found here:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Let me know if this worked for you!
